aboutOzone.title: What is
aboutOzone.p1: Ozone (O₃) is a triatomic oxygen molecule, a powerful natural oxidizer. It is formed from atmospheric oxygen using electrical discharge.
aboutOzone.p2: Upon contact with microorganisms, ozone destroys their cell membranes, then decomposes into ordinary oxygen (O₂), leaving no harmful chemical residues.

list.safe: Safe for humans and animals after decomposition
